Body:
policies = self.iam.role_policies()
assert len(set(policies)) == 0
iam = IAM(role_name='AWSServiceRoleForAPIGateway')
assert iam.role_policies() == {'APIGatewayServiceRolePolicy':
    'arn:aws:iam::aws:policy/aws-service-role/APIGatewayServiceRolePolicy'}
assert len(iam.role_policies_statements().get('APIGatewayServiceRolePolicy'
    )[0].get('Action')) > 10
